1111770.name: UP UP UP UP
1111770.description:
Escape the Dungeon. Fight the Physics. Become the Slime.

Inspired by rage platformers like Getting Over It and Jump King, Up Up Up UpÂ challenges you to ascend a treacherous vertical dungeon as a determined slime girl â€” one slippery bounce at a time.

But thereâ€™s a catch: you're chained to a massive, unwieldy iron ball that reacts to your every move. Swing it to gain momentum. Use it to reach higher ground. Or, watch helplessly as it drags you down after a single misstep. The physics are unforgiving â€” and that's the point.
